subject: Football
Recordings and Downloads (Video)
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said that Patriots’ Coach Bill Belichick would not be punished further after the disclosure of new videotapes turned over by a former assistant.
snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said that Patriots’ Coach Bill Belichick would not be punished further after the disclosure of new videotapes turned over by a former assistant.
